Estimate mixture covariance matrix from within-group covariance matrices

Source: R/mix_matrix.R
mix_matrix.Rd

Estimate mixture covariance matrix from within-group covariance matrices

mix_matrix(
  sigma_list,
  mu_mat,
  p_vec,
  N = Inf,
  group_names = NULL,
  var_names = NULL
)

Arguments

sigma_list

List of covariance matrices.
mu_mat

Matrix of mean parameters, with groups on the rows and variables on the columns.
p_vec

Vector of proportion of cases in each group.
N

Optional total sample size across all groups (used to compute unbiased covariance estimates).
group_names

Optional vector of group names.
var_names

Optional vector of variable names.

Value

List of mixture covariances and means.

Examples

out <- unmix_matrix(sigma_mat = reshape_vec2mat(.5, order = 2),
                    mu_mat = rbind(c(0, 0), c(.5, 1)),
                    p_vec =  c(.3, .7), N = 100)

mix_matrix(sigma_list = out$cov_group_unbiased,
           mu_mat = out$means_raw[-3,],
           p_vec = out$p_group, N = out$N)

#> $N
#> [1] 100
#> 
#> $n_group
#> group_1 group_2 
#>      30      70 
#> 
#> $p_group
#> group_1 group_2 
#>     0.3     0.7 
#> 
#> $cov_total_unbiased
#>     x1  x2
#> x1 1.0 0.5
#> x2 0.5 1.0
#> 
#> $cov_total_ml
#>       x1    x2
#> x1 0.990 0.495
#> x2 0.495 0.990
#> 
#> $cov_group_unbiased
#> $cov_group_unbiased$group_1
#>           x1        x2
#> x1 0.9698276 0.4034483
#> x2 0.4034483 0.8068966
#> 
#> $cov_group_unbiased$group_2
#>           x1        x2
#> x1 0.9510870 0.3956522
#> x2 0.3956522 0.7913043
#> 
#> 
#> $cov_group_ml
#> $cov_group_ml$group_1
#>        x1   x2
#> x1 0.9375 0.39
#> x2 0.3900 0.78
#> 
#> $cov_group_ml$group_2
#>        x1   x2
#> x1 0.9375 0.39
#> x2 0.3900 0.78
#> 
#> 
#> $means_raw
#>           x1  x2
#> group_1 0.00 0.0
#> group_2 0.50 1.0
#> Total   0.35 0.7
#> 
#> $means_centered
#>                 x1         x2
#> group_1 -0.3500000 -0.7000000
#> group_2  0.1474937  0.2949874
#> Total    0.0000000  0.0000000
#>
